column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Patty - Thank you very much for the review. Very glad you enjoyed our fare. While parking can be a pain
column2: the fact that the parking garage around the corner is free does help
column3: and the valet service on the first floor doesn't charge
column4: although the valet guys do accept tips. Thanks again
column5: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
